text: Gomɗii Alla Nanngi ahadi ɓiɗɓe Israa'iila ɓen, Men Immini e maɓɓe gori sappo e ɗiɗi. Allaahu On Daali : "Min Miɗo Wonndi e mooɗon : si on ñiiɓnii julde nden, on jonnii asakal ngal, on gomɗinii Nulaaɓe Am ɓen, o teddinii ɓe, on ñawlii Alla ñamaande moƴƴunde, Ma Mi heefan on bonɗi mon ɗin, Ma Mi Naadoy on Aljannaaji ɗi no ila e ley majji canɗi. Kala on yedduɗo e mooɗon ɓaawo ɗum, gomɗii on majjii laawol fotondirngol ngol". @Corrected
